meanings.definition: Relating to or involving two or more governments.
meanings.sent1: The intergovernmental meeting discussed ways for countries to work together.
meanings.sent2: The intergovernmental agreement was signed by multiple nations.
meanings.sent3: The intergovernmental task force had representatives from various government bodies.
meanings.sent4: The intergovernmental cooperation led to successful international policies.
meanings.sent5: The intergovernmental relationship between neighboring countries was strengthened.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring between different levels of government.
meanings.sent1: The intergovernmental communication channels helped local and national authorities coordinate.
meanings.sent2: The intergovernmental conflicts often arose due to differing priorities.
meanings.sent3: The intergovernmental rivalry for resources sometimes led to humorous misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The intergovernmental bridge connected the city and state administrations.
meanings.sent5: The intergovernmental dynamics shaped the decision-making processes at all levels.
